name: TinyMCE Advanced qTranslate fix editor problems
author: David St√∂ckl

sections.description:
For fixing problems with TinyMCE Advanced and qTranslate. Remove line breaks and whitespace, enable custom stylesheets and multiple textareas. Fully customizable.

Plugin Homepage: http://www.blackbam.at/blackbams-blog/2012/01/28/wordpress-3-3-tinymce-advanced-qtranslate-fix-style-problems/

Note: This plugin can be useful, but it is not complete yet, as the combination of the two Plugins can cause a lot of problems. Please report any problems or code improvements you may find.

Known issues
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “tinymce-advanced-qtranslate-fix-editor-problems” directory into the /wp-content/plugins/ of WordPress or use the auto-installer.

  2. Activate the Plugin through the Plugins page.

  3. Maybe you want to change the defaults in Settings -> Fix TQ Editor.

  4. Enjoy.
